description:
A mysterious wanderer known as Kenshin is taken at the Kamiya Kasshin Dojo, a martial arts school run by a young woman named Kaoru.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Bikenshi... Ai Yue ni Tatakau Otoko
Yakışıklı Kılıç Ustası Efsanesi / Aşkı İçin Savaşan Bir Adam
ตำนานนักรบซามูไร การต่อสู้เพื่อความรัก
伝説の美剣士... 愛ゆえに闘う男
